item.title: research
item.description: Research A list of peer-reviewed publications (12 total, 9 first author) can be found on arXiv or ADS I also maintain a list below. In reverse-chronological order: T. Crossland, P. Stenetorp, D. Kawata, S. Riedel, T. D. Kitching, A. Deshpande, T. Kimpson, C. Liew-Cain, C. Pedersen, D. Piras, M. Sharma : “Toward Machine-learning-based Metastudies: Applications to Cosmological Parameters”. ApJS, 2023, doi: 10.3847/1538-4365/acf76a T. Kimpson : “RelativisticDynamics.jl: Relativistic Spin-Orbital Dynamics in Julia”.
